name: stickball
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a game similar to baseball played informally on the street with a stick for a bat, and a rubber ball: The neighbourhoods are filled with kids playing stickball. Bill Jr grew up hearing about his father's stickball prowess.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's an area where his barefoot playmates play stickball. He still remembers the day a skinny-legged new kid on the block asked to join their stickball game."It's like the Yankees playing a stickball team," he said.
